title: 2014 Forest River Sabre Fifth-Wheel Travel Trailer
item_description:
Travel Trailer

Trailer Details

  • Year: 2014
  • Make: Forest River
  • Model: Sabre
  • VIN: 4X4FSRE28E3008656
  • License: 1MF3729
    • Expiration Date: 7/31/2025
  • Gross Vehicle Weight Rating (GVWR): 11600
  • Trailer Type: Fifth-wheel travel trailer

Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 30’
  • Overall Width: 8’
  • Overall Height: 10’

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Leaf Spring
  • Number of Axles: 2
  • Brake Type: Electric
  • Number of Wheels: 5
  • Electric Plug Type: 7-Way Round
  • Hitch: 5th Wheel

 

  • Make and Model: Forest River/Sebri 30-foot 5th Wheel Travel Trailer

 

  • Seller States: Everything works as it should; no known issues with any part of the trailer.
  • Features:
    • Three slide-outs
    • Bunk room with two bunk beds and closet area
    • Full shower
    • Slide-out in bedroom/bathroom area
    • Fitted with two new La-Z-Boy leather recliner couches
  • Included Contents:
    • Bicycles:
      • (2) custom-built Bud Light mountain bikes (employee-only models)
    • Outdoor Equipment:
      • (1) outdoor propane fire pit
      • (1) 24-inch Blackstone grill plate with stand
      • (1) self-standing stainless steel barbecue
      • (2) double-burner propane gas stoves
      • (1) large solar panel for dry camping
      • (1) 20-foot telescopic flagpole with mount on rear bumper
      • (1) pop-up bug screen dining enclosure (10 × 10 feet)
    • Kitchen Appliances:
      • (1) double-bin Ninja air fryer
      • (1) coffee pod maker
    • Furniture and Accessories:
      • (2) foldable tables
      • (6) camping chairs

Note: Certificate of Title, and Transfer Form will be mailed within 1 week of removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, applying for new plates, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV.
